channel.title: time on Ritual dust
channel.description: Recent content in time on Ritual dust

item.title: End of years
item.description: This page is a collections of notes, ramblings and highlights for each year I pass through. I’m starting this at the end of 2021 with the intention of adding to it yearly. A good companion to this is the Timeline which retraces my projects and notes chronologically. Highlights of 2022 Started a Patreon with a monthly print club Started tattooing for real Highlights of 2021 Moved in with my partner Hex Published the first issue of Fant√¥mes zine with contributions from a lot of great folks Travelled to Saguenay with some friends Lost my job and found a way better one Started painting again started working on a small dungeon crawler game with Devine started working on a new album for Blood and Dust Made a card game for Treecrets Made black metal logos for 6 bands/projects made a whole lot more black metal logos for fun Got my first big illustration contract which made me consider a path to live from my art Learned a lot more about myself Joined the Stone Club Stayed inside a whole bunch Highlights of 2020 Found my drawing style Released the first Blood and Dust album Turned this website into a more personal website Joined Merveilles again on Mastodon this time
